about_the_game:
Asleep - Ato 2 has a new Steam page! Please be sure to check Nuuvem's publisher homepage and wishlist the next chapter of our story.

The page you are currently reading will be deactivated soon.

_______________________________________________________

Asleep is a psychological horror adventure in the classic 2D point-and-click style, set in the Brazilian Northeast of the 90s, with a unique artistic look. This is the second episode that continues the story of Ana Lúcia, who this time finds herself in a new nightmare, even more intense and disturbing.

New scenarios and characters emerge, connecting the protagonist's confusing reality and already known environments and characters that this time will deliver more information, bringing new questions and further expanding Ana's universe. You continue with your inseparable flashlight, finding new items, puzzles, and even more challenging creatures this time. The nightmare continues...

And much more:

  • Find cassettes with recordings that bring back memories and clues to solve the story's mysteries.

  • Face 5 unique creatures in this chapter, 3 are exclusive to Act 2, and one of them will return even more ruthlessly.

  • Exploration of new scenarios with many more characters, including a village in the backlands.

  • New original puzzles involving the protagonist's use of lighting and flashlight.

  • Many more characters and collectibles to delve deeper into the plot.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work, including: Violence or Gore, Blood, Insinuated consumption of alcohol or tobacco, Psychological horror, and Social themes (references to mental health issues, suicide and harassment).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Upon mysteriously waking up on the outskirts of a small village, Ana Lúcia continues her journey in search of answers in a supposedly peaceful new environment but soon experiences suspicious events forcing her to face even more intense and disturbing dangers. The nightmare continues.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
